PolicyInfo.Text: NCL Consumer Advice: FOR EMBARKATION/RE-ENTRY INTO THE US: US/CANADIAN CITIZENS MUST CARRY DOCUMENTARY PROOF OF CITIZENSHIP. REQUIREMENTS VARY BY DESTINATION AND GUESTS ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR VERIFYING THEIR REQUIREMENTS. OTHER NATIONALITIES MUST CARRY VALID PASSPORTS AND VERIFY THEIR VISA REQUIREMENTS WITH CONSULATES FOR EACH DESTINATION. GUESTS WITHOUT PROPER DOCUMENTATION WILL NOT BE ALLOWED TO BOARD. TERMS AND CONDITIONS ARE IN THE NCL BROCHURES AND ARE ALSO AVAILABLE AT http://www.ncl.com
